roleset.name: to encase in a capsule
roleset.note: ENCAPSULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'encapsulate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from encapsulate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Under the plan , [the companies]-1 will use Calgene 's patented technology [*-1]to encapsulate microbes such as Bacillus subtilis , a bacterium , [*-2] to enhance their biological activity against plant diseases .
example.arg: microbes such as Bacillus subtilis , a bacterium ,
[*-2] to enhance their biological activity against plant diseases
